thread.title: Father must give up his 'abusive' school website | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Father must give up his 'abusive' school website | Daily Mail Online

author: Joseph Curtis For Mailonline
title: Father must give up his 'abusive' school website | Daily Mail Online
text: Father, 58, was so furious he paid £125,000 in school fees when his son only achieved one GCSE set up a website to troll them Scott Craddock set up 'abusive' website to criticise Abbotsholme School His son David left the £28,000-a-year private school with a C grade in science Mr Craddock, 58, said he 'wasted' £125,000 on the teenager's education He used the website to monitor the school's results but was ordered to remove it School gets control of site as its domain name is 'too similar' to the real website Father-of-two even paid for 1p Google advert to get his site above the real one He said he would not appeal the decision as it would cost him £3,000 But he is continuing legal action against school for 'not providing value' Published: 08:37 GMT, 28 February 2017 | Updated: 14:52 GMT, 28 February 2017 241 shares
